person_say: I've been stuck with no ideas for my writing. I really need a way to boost my creativity.
animal_say: Feeling stuck can be frustrating! What kind of writing are you working on, and how does this affect your creativity?

person_say: I'm working on a short story, but feeling stuck is really affecting my creativity. I can't seem to get any ideas flowing.
animal_say: I hear you! There’s a wise bear named Bruno who specializes in relaxation and creativity. Would you like to meet him?

person_say: Yes, meeting Bruno sounds wonderful! I would love to see what creativity tips he has for me.
animal_say: Great choice! Bruno will share some wonderful tips to unleash your creativity. Let’s go meet him!
